description: Excelsior is thin aspen wood shavings used in insulation, packaging, firefighter training, and several other applications.
short desc: Excelsior is thin aspen wood shavings.
source: Material procured in a bulk bale from company specializing in excelsior.

measured property.test description: Simultaneous thermal analyzer experiments were conducted at a heating rate of 10 K/min.
Micro-scale combustion calorimeter tests were conducted at a heating rate of 30 K/min.

derived property.test description: Effective heat of combustion [MJ/kg] is calculated from data collected in micro-scale combustion calorimeter experiments.
